works.description:
Dear support team,

I am writing to you as a member of the legal department of ICANS GmbH,  
authorized to deal with the legal issues of Swerford Holdings Ltd. and  
authorized to act on the company’s behalf in this matter.

Swerford Holdings Ltd. is a registered company in Gibraltar and operates  
the website www.pokerstrategy.com. PokerStrategy.com is an online poker  
school where users have the opportunity to learn how to play poker  
successfully. After registering at the website they get access to various  
strategy articles, coaching videos and poker software produced and  
developed by PokerStrategy.com. All services are offered in 19 different  
languages and are offered free of charge. Furthermore, the users can start  
play online poker for real money through www.pokerstrategy.com on various  
poker websites of PokerStrategy’s partners. For an easier start in playing  
online poker, every user has a chance to receive a free start capital of 50  
USD paid by PokerStrategy.com at his poker account. Therefore, it is  
necessary to pass the PokerStrategy-Quiz consisting of 20 questions about  
poker strategy and which is based on PokerStrategy’s beginner level  
articles the users have to read first. Swerford Holdings Ltd. is the  
exclusive copyright owner with respect to all strategy articles, videos,  
software and the PokerStrategy-Quiz published on www.pokerstartegy.com. It  
is strictly forbidden to download, copy or to share any of its copyrighted  
contents unless the user has a written permission by Swerford Holdings  
Ltd./PokerStrategy.com.

An employee of PokerStrategy’s Spanish community management noticed that  
the blog owner is violating company’s copyrights by using its intellectual  
property without any authorization. He published Spanish questions and  
answers to the PokerStrategy-Quiz at his blog, offering this way an  
opportunity to cheat at the Quiz and to receive the free start capital  
fraudulently. There is no agreement between the user and Swerford Holdings  
Ltd. regarding a permission to publish any of its copyrighted contents on  
third party websites. PokerStrategy’s offer to receive a free start capital  
is an essential element of company’s success. Thus, it is of big importance  
to keep the quiz questions and answers in confidence up to that point when  
the user starts with the Quiz. For that reason we kindly ask you to remove  
the respective content from that website.

Thank you very much in advance.

Yours sincerely.
